mapper.sql: EXAM_ID examId, EMP_ID empId, APPOINT_ID appointId, EXAP_ORG_ID exapOrgId, EXAP_ORG_NAME exapOrgName, EXAM_STATUS examStatus, COMPANY_NAME companyName, EXAM_YEAR examYear, EXAM_NO examNo, AUTH_FLAG authFlag, REPORT_ID reportId, REPORT_ANA_ID reportAnaId, EXAM_COMBO examCombo, EXAM_TIME examTime, APPOINTMENT_TIME appointmentTime, CANCEL_TIME cancelTime, REPORT_BACK_TIME reportBackTime, UPLOAD_EMP_ID uploadEmpId, UPLOAD_REPORT_TIME uploadReportTime, GET_DATA_TIME getDataTime, CREATE_TIME createTime, EXAM_ERROR examError, exap_org_parent_name exapOrgParentName, exap_org_parent_id exapOrgParentId
mapper.insert: insert into ph_exam ( EXAM_ID, EMP_ID, APPOINT_ID, EXAP_ORG_ID, EXAP_ORG_NAME, EXAM_STATUS, COMPANY_NAME, EXAM_YEAR, EXAM_NO, AUTH_FLAG, REPORT_ID, REPORT_ANA_ID, EXAM_COMBO, EXAM_TIME, APPOINTMENT_TIME, CANCEL_TIME, REPORT_BACK_TIME, UPLOAD_EMP_ID, UPLOAD_REPORT_TIME, GET_DATA_TIME, CREATE_TIME, EXAM_ERROR, exap_org_parent_name, exap_org_parent_id ) values ( #{examId:BIGINT}, #{empId:BIGINT}, #{appointId:VARCHAR}, #{exapOrgId:VARCHAR}, #{exapOrgName:VARCHAR}, #{examStatus:NUMERIC}, #{companyName:VARCHAR}, #{examYear:NUMERIC}, #{examNo:VARCHAR}, #{authFlag:NUMERIC}, #{reportId:VARCHAR}, #{reportAnaId:VARCHAR}, #{examCombo:VARCHAR}, #{examTime:TIMESTAMP}, #{appointmentTime:TIMESTAMP}, #{cancelTime:TIMESTAMP}, #{reportBackTime:TIMESTAMP}, #{uploadEmpId:VARCHAR}, #{uploadReportTime:TIMESTAMP}, #{getDataTime:TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime:TIMESTAMP}, #{examError:VARCHAR}, #{exapOrgParentName:VARCHAR}, #{exapOrgParentId:VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update ph_exam set #{EMP_ID = empId:BIGINT}, #{APPOINT_ID = appointId:VARCHAR}, #{EXAP_ORG_ID = exapOrgId:VARCHAR}, #{EXAP_ORG_NAME = exapOrgName:VARCHAR}, #{EXAM_STATUS = examStatus:NUMERIC}, #{COMPANY_NAME = companyName:VARCHAR}, #{EXAM_YEAR = examYear:NUMERIC}, #{EXAM_NO = examNo:VARCHAR}, #{AUTH_FLAG = authFlag:NUMERIC}, #{REPORT_ID = reportId:VARCHAR}, #{REPORT_ANA_ID = reportAnaId:VARCHAR}, #{EXAM_COMBO = examCombo:VARCHAR}, #{EXAM_TIME = examTime:TIMESTAMP}, #{APPOINTMENT_TIME = appointmentTime:TIMESTAMP}, #{CANCEL_TIME = cancelTime:TIMESTAMP}, #{REPORT_BACK_TIME = reportBackTime:TIMESTAMP}, #{UPLOAD_EMP_ID = uploadEmpId:VARCHAR}, #{UPLOAD_REPORT_TIME = uploadReportTime:TIMESTAMP}, #{GET_DATA_TIME = getDataTime:TIMESTAMP}, #{CREATE_TIME = createTime:TIMESTAMP}, #{EXAM_ERROR = examError:VARCHAR}, #{exap_org_parent_name = exapOrgParentName:VARCHAR}, #{exap_org_parent_id = exapOrgParentId:VARCHAR} where EXAM_ID = #{examId:BIGINT}
